message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $10,000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this product. However, I am only able to pay up to $8,000 for it. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm looking for a little more than that. Could you do $9,000?
Hello Alice, thank you for your response. I understand your position, but unfortunately, I am unable to increase my offer. I am still interested in purchasing the product at $8,000.
